entry.def: Residual is used to describe what remains of something when most of it has gone.

example.tran: 核武器实验后残留的辐射

example.ex: Turn the hotplate off and allow the residual heat to keep the mixture simmering.
example.tran: 把烤盘关掉，让余热把混合物再煨一下。

means.word_mean: 1. something left after other parts have been taken away;

sentences.sentence: "he took what he wanted and I got the balance"

means.word_mean: 2. (often plural) a payment that is made to a performer or writer or director of a television show or commercial that is paid for every repeat showing;
1. relating to or indicating a remainder;

stems_affixes.word_buile: as一再+sid坐+uous多……的→一再坐着[学习] →勤奋的
dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同
in内+sid坐+ious……的→坐在内部的→不为人知的,阴险的
re再+sid坐+ual表形容词→一再坐再旁边的→多余的
sed=sid坐+ulous多……的→坐得多得→勤奋得
sub次一等,副手+sid旁边+iary→下面旁边的辅助的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,政见不同,异议
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+sid坐+ence表名词→分开坐→意见不同
dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剩余[财产];残余,渣滓,滤渣
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sid放置+ue→[不能用]放回去→残余
sub在下面+sid旁边+y→下面旁边[不是主要的收入]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sid坐+er→坐在一起→考虑到
